comment.body:
Resist what?
Edit, I see:
> Trump administration mandating EPA scientific studies, data undergo review by political staff before public release.
https://twitter.com/AP/status/824374557893083146

This isn't good, because it is unnecesssary and will ~~lead to centralization again~~ potentially cause breakages and the owner has full control over the "CDN" so it could maliciously edit the files.
Anyway, the problem you're trying to solve should be solved at ZeroNet client level simply by de-duplicating files.
So someone should add an issue on Github or submit a Pull Request to implement data de-duplication.
